pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis and Graphics for Unreplicated Experiments // Provides half-normal plots, reference plots, and Pareto plots of effects from an unreplicated experiment, along with various pseudo- standard-error measures, simulated reference distributions, and other tools. Many of these methods are described in Daniel C. (1959) doi:10.1080/00401706.1959.10489866 and/or Lenth R.V. (1989) doi:10.1080/00401706.1989.10488595, but some new approaches are added and integrated in one package.
